0.text: Bug 115938  Issues in the Library feature.

1.text: The following issues are noticed - Cannot add report items to container report items in layout of a library As a result user cannot add labels or text items to a grid/table item.

2.text: - In the library spec, there is no plan for separate library perspective, but  the actuate implementation has a separate library perspective.

3.text: - If a report design does not include a library, and if a user tries to drag a  report item from the library exploer to report design, the user should be  provided the option to include hte library.
